items.title: Palestinian woman in hospital after being clubbed by masked Israeli settler
items.description: The attacker is seen striking the 55-year-old woman with a large wooden stick during the assault in the West Bank village of Turmus Ayaa.

items.title: Nigerian police fire tear gas as protesters gather over separatist leader
items.description: The protesters are seeking the release of Nnamdi Kanu who has been in detention since 2021 on terrorism charges.

items.title: Driver dies after Italian basketball fans' bus attacked with stones
items.description: The bus was targeted by fans from a rival team after an earlier game, local media reports.

items.title: Deadly Gaza flare-up tests Israel-Hamas ceasefire
items.description: The deadliest day of attacks since the truce took effect on 10 October raises questions as to whether it will last.

items.title: 'We have failed' says minister as France reels from Louvre heist
items.description: A hunt is under way to find the four thieves before the jewels - which once belonged to French royals - vanish for good.
